channel.title: CVE Feed for nosilver4u -- EWWW Image Optimizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nosilver4u -- EWWW Image Optimizer

item.title: CVE-2020-36750|2024-10-23T15:08:08.348Z -- nosilver4u -- ewww%20image%20optimizer
item.description: The EWWW Image Optimizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 5.8.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ewww_ngg_bulk_init() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to perform bulk image optimization via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
